previewArticle.title: Canada vs. Bulgaria | International Friendly Preview

recapArticle.title: Bulgaria 1, Canada 1 | International Friendly Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt saved. Randy Edwini-Bonsu (Canada) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Attempt missed. Atiba Hutchinson (Canada) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Match ends, Bulgaria 1, Canada 1.
Randy Edwini-Bonsu (Canada) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Yordan Hristov (Bulgaria).
Penalty conceded by Svetoslav Dyakov (Bulgaria) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Canada. Tosaint Antony Ricketts draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt saved. Simeon Jackson (Canada) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Randy Edwini-Bonsu.
Veselin Minev (Bulgaria) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Pacheco (Canada).
Svetoslav Dyakov (Bulgaria) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Atiba Hutchinson (Canada).
Attempt saved. Tosaint Antony Ricketts (Canada) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Atiba Hutchinson.
Attempt saved. Randy Edwini-Bonsu (Canada) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom left corner.
Pacheco (Canada) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Todor Nedelev (Bulgaria).
Foul by David Edgar (Canada).
Andrej Galabinov (Bulgaria) wins a free kick on the left wing.
First Half ends, Bulgaria 1, Canada 1.
Second Half begins Bulgaria 1, Canada 1.
Foul by Nikolay Bodurov (Bulgaria).
Atiba Hutchinson (Canada) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Andrej Galabinov (Bulgaria) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Deuxième demie en cours #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 46‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Pas de substitution pour #canMNT en début de 2e demie.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Ricketts picks up a yellow card. #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 48'.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Carton jaune Ricketts #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 49‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Corner Bulgarie dévié par une coup de tête qui passe hors cadre #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 51‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Hutchinson dangerous on the ball again wins a fk for #canMNT

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Coup franc de Pacheco qui est repoussé par le gardien BUL. #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 52‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Carton Jaune BUL Dyakov #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 54‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Corner BUL.. Borjan capte #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 57‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: BUL with some sustained possession, #canMNT maintaining shape well.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Save! Borjan out to close down a Bulgarian player. Stops the ball point blank and is feeling it. Getting some treatment. #canMNT 1-1 BUL.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Borjan au sol. reçoit des soins. #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 60‘

timelineItems.comment: Jérémy Gagnon-Laparé (Canada) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ivelin Popov (Bulgaria).

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: La bulgarie avec un bel effort, mais le tir est dévié hors cadre. #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 65‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Borjan fait un bel arrêt assisté de la défensive #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 66‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Corner BUL. Dégagé par le Canada #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 67‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: #canMNT sub: REB replaced by Jeremy Gagnon-Lapare, 68'.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: SUBS CAN: Gagnon-Laparé remplace Edwini Bonsu #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 68‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Haut tir lobbé de la Bulgarie stoppé par Borjan #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 70‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Coup franc BUL, dégagé par #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 71‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: #canMNT under a lot of pressure but keeping BUL away from dangerous areas. #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 72'.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Carton jaune Popov BUL #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 73‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: #canMNT sub: Jackson remplacé par Cyle Larin, 74'.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: #canMNT sub: Jackson replaced by Cyle Larin, 74'.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Save! Borjan with a fantastic diving effort off a corner kick to keep things tied. #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 75'.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Première présence senoir pour Larin #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 77‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Première présence senior pour Larin #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 77‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: #canMNT still hanging on into the final 10 minutes.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: MIlanov reçcoit des soins après une collision avec Borjan #canMNT 1-1 BUL

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: BUL sub: Georgi Milanov replacé par Hristo Zlatinski, 81’. #canMNT

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: La Bulgarie en controle actuellement. Le canada s’accroche. #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 86‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: #canMNT sub: Pacheco replaced by Samuel Piette, 86'.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: SUB CAN: Samuel Piette remplace Pedro Pacheco #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 86‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: #canMNT sub: Hutchinson replaced by Daniel Haber, 88'.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: SUB CAN: Hutchinson remplacé par Daniel Haber #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 88‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: 1 minute de temps ajouté #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 90‘

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Full time: #canMNT 1-1 BUL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ivelin Popov (Bulgaria) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner.

timelineItems.name: Canada Soccer
timelineItems.text: Coup de sifflet. Marque finale. #canMNT 1-1 BUL, 90’+1 But BUL: Galabinov 19' But CAN: Hutshinson (PEN) 27'

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nikolas Ledgerwood (Canada).
Ivelin Popov (Bulgaria) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Second Half ends, Bulgaria 1, Canada 1.
